name: Ballon Jumper; BD edition!
description:
A big quest has been given to you! Bounce on the Balloons to reach the top and get all the elements you will need.

Use WASD or ← · ↑ · → · ↓ 

A special surprise awaits for the ones that complete the 3 levels.

===

Is a small prototype I made some time ago, with newly refurbished graphics by an amazing Artist called Victor Romero.

Also Nicolás Flores help me with some programming, and Javier Norambuena provided the music.

This version has a special surprise for my wife and daughter
